dict.string: The Battle of Installation 05 begins
John-117 is stranded in the hanger of the UNSC Forward Unto Dawn.
The Arbiter kills the Prophet of Truth.
After over four years of drifting, John-117 wakes up from cryo sleep.
Jul 'Mdama is killed by Jameson Locke in order to rescue Catherine Halsey
The Battle of Onyx begins.
The High Prophet of Regret's fleet arrives at Earth.
The UNSC Pillar of Autumn arrives at Alpha Halo.
Reach is glassed.
Cortana is created from Dr. Catherine Halsey's flash-cloned brain.
The Rookie joins the UNSC Marine Corp.
ONI Section Two publicly unveils the SPARTAN-II Program in order to boost morale.
MJOLNIR Mark V Armor is produced.
UNSC declares the UNSC Spirit of Fire and its crew KIA.
Kat-320 is born on Monastir, New Harmony.
Edward Buck enlists in the UNSC Marine Corps.
The WINTER CONTINGENCY protocol is enacted by the UNSC.
Humanity comes into contact with the Covenant for the first time.
Emile-A239 is born on Luxor, Eridanus II.
Spartan-IIs train on Reach, where they successfully capture a Marine base flag.
Dr. Catherine Halsey becomes scientific advisor in the Office of Naval Intelligence.
The Covenant discover the Unggoy homeworld, Balaho.
Humans settle on Luna, Mars, the Jovian Moons, and asteroids.
The International Society of Civil Engineers is established on Earth.
The UNSC Infinity is officially commissioned.
Following the war against the Covenant, the SPARTAN-IV Program is greenlit.
John-117 is born in Elysium City on Eridanus II.
The ORION Project is re-initiated.
